Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional capabilities and the unique benefits it offers, I am confident it will be a valuable asset to your business. Considering its intrinsic value and the benefits it provides, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product for $950,000. This price reflects not only the product's worth but also includes comprehensive support and customization options to ensure it meets your specific needs. I look forward to discussing how we can make this opportunity a reality for you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
